text: (Say) also to them, O Muhammad: (In Whose hand is the dominion over all things) in Whose hand is the store of all things (and He protecteth) and He judges, (while against Him there is no protection) while no judgement can be made upon him; it is also said that this means: He protects people from His chastisement but none can protect others from His chastisement, (if ye have knowledge?
